name: Snow Boarder Demo
description:
Welcome to my first game, a snowboarding prototype!

In this game, you'll race down an infinite procedurally generated slope, doing flips and boosting.

You'll be introduced to the basics of the game in a tutorial level, then you'll be free to play on a procedurally generated sprite shape based terrain.

If you stay still for too long, the game will prompt you to restart the level.

Overall, this game was a great experience for getting my feet wet with game development.

Also, all the assets were generated using Stable Diffusion.
